columns.name: organisation_path
columns.dc:title: Organisation Path
columns.schema:description: A sequence of colon separated Organisation Keys that fully specifies the Provider Organisation providing a service to the client.

columns.name: instrument_key
columns.dc:title: Instrument Key
columns.schema:description: A sequence of characters which uniquely identifies the survey instrument to the Primary Health Network. Assigned by the Primary Health Network.

columns.name: survey_key
columns.dc:title: Survey Key
columns.schema:description: A sequence of characters which uniquely identifies the survey to the Primary Health Network. Assigned by the Primary Health Network.

columns.name: yes_phn_item1
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 1
columns.schema:description: You felt welcome using this service.

columns.name: yes_phn_item2
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 2
columns.schema:description: You felt safe using this service.

columns.name: yes_phn_item3
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 3
columns.schema:description: You had access to this service when you needed.

columns.name: yes_phn_item4
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 4
columns.schema:description: You had opportunities for your family and friends to be involved in your support or care if you wanted.

columns.name: yes_phn_item5
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 5
columns.schema:description: Staff were able to provide information or advice to help you manage your physical health if you wanted.

columns.name: yes_phn_item6
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 6
columns.schema:description: Your individuality and values were respected (such as your culture, faith or gender identity, etc.)

columns.name: yes_phn_item7
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 7
columns.schema:description: This service listened to and followed up on feedback or complaints.

columns.name: yes_phn_item8
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 8
columns.schema:description: The service respected your right to make decisions.

columns.name: yes_phn_item9
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 9
columns.schema:description: The support or care available met your needs.

columns.name: yes_phn_item10
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 10
columns.schema:description: Access to a peer worker/ lived experience worker, if you wanted.

columns.name: yes_phn_item11
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 11
columns.schema:description: The support or care available met your needs.

columns.name: yes_phn_item12
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 12
columns.schema:description: Development of a plan with you that considered all of your needs (including support, coordination and follow up).

columns.name: yes_phn_item13
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 13
columns.schema:description: The effect of this service on your hopefulness for the future.

columns.name: yes_phn_item14
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 14
columns.schema:description: The effect of this service on your skills and strategies to look after your own health and wellbeing.

columns.name: yes_phn_item15
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 15
columns.schema:description: The effect of this service on your ability to manage your day to day life.

columns.name: yes_phn_item16
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 16
columns.schema:description: Overall, how would you rate your experience with this service in the last 3 months?

columns.name: yes_phn_item17
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 17
columns.schema:description: My experience would have been better if … (write in).

columns.name: yes_phn_item18
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 18
columns.schema:description: The best things about this service were … (write in.)

columns.name: yes_phn_item19
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 19
columns.schema:description: What is your gender identity?

columns.name: yes_phn_item19_other
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 19 Other
columns.schema:description: What is your gender identity (other)?

columns.name: yes_phn_item20
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 20
columns.schema:description: What is the main language you speak at home?

columns.name: yes_phn_item20_other
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 20 Other
columns.schema:description: What is the main language you speak at home (other)?

columns.name: yes_phn_item21
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 21
columns.schema:description: Are you of Aboriginal or Torres Strait Island origin?

columns.name: yes_phn_item22
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 22
columns.schema:description: What is your age?

columns.name: yes_phn_item23
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 23
columns.schema:description: How long have you been receiving support or care from this service?

columns.name: yes_phn_item24
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 24
columns.schema:description: Who referred you to this service?

columns.name: yes_phn_item24_other
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 24 Other
columns.schema:description: Who referred you to this service (other)?

columns.name: yes_phn_item25
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 25
columns.schema:description: How involved were you in choosing this service?

columns.name: yes_phn_item26
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Question 26
columns.schema:description: Did someone help you complete this survey?

columns.name: yes_phn_tags
columns.dc:title: YES PHN Tags
columns.schema:description: List of tags for the instrument.
